description: Feel the crunch of ice or the peaceful swoosh of fresh powder under your boots while staying warm in the Burdell Down Jacket. This good-looking insulated winter coat is powered by 600-fill-power down, a water-resistant and lightweight solution for venturing out into the cold. Zip up this puffer over your go-to base layer for exploring snowy streets or scraping snow off your car for a drive to the mountain. Throw on your most reliable GORE-TEX shell and the Burdell is now a midlayer's dream come true on the coldest ski days of the year.
name: Marmot Burdell Jacket - Mens
